snippet.title: 琴葉姉妹とライサント島の伝説 (a 2.5D action RPG) #1
snippet.description:
琴葉姉妹とライサント島の伝説 (Demo Ver.)
DEVELOPER : DeskClub Games

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gameplay #1
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q_Pf_tHyT9g
Gameplay #2
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=scRp20ZTcjM&t=650s
Gameplay #3
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IIozut5cpyk&t=367s
Gameplay #4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V9BpMOk5doo&t=2253s
Gameplay #5
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G2Zavx6vfcQ
Gameplay #6 (End Demo)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j_2pqMV3OVQ
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Indie Games (2.5D)
- https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBXI4aXCmjui82XQrdbQdY83EFua9X3E5
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ The Kotonoha Sisters and the Legend of Lysant Island ]
This game is a turn-based action RPG that moves around in a 3D 
space where you can enjoy various scenery with cute 2D characters. 
Operate the Kotonoha sisters and explore a fun and mysterious island!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
ダウンロード （Steam :）
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1569180/The_Kotonoha_Sisters_and_the_Legend_of_Lysant_Island/
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
